com.davidbracewell.io.structured

Class Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.io.structured.Element
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONElement, XMLElement

    public abstract class Element
extends Object

    An element represents a sub-tree of a document object model. It allows for selecting child elements and getting its text, name, values, and attributes

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

        public abstract String getAttribute(String attributeName)
        Gets the value of a specific attribute on the element.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the attribute name
        Returns:
        the attribute value or null if the attribute does not exist

      • getAttributeNames

        public abstract Set<String> getAttributeNames()
        Gets a set of the attribute names.
        Returns:
        the attribute names associated with the element

      • getChildren

        Gets the children of the element.
        Returns:
        the children or an empty list if there are no children.

      • hasAttribute

        public abstract boolean hasAttribute(String name)
        Determines if an attribute by the given name is contained in the element
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        True if the element has the attribute, false if not

      • hasChildren

        public abstract boolean hasChildren()
        Determines if the element has children
        Returns:
        True if the element has children

      • select

        public final Stream<Element> select(@NonNull
                                    Predicate<Element> predicate)

      • select

        public final Stream<Element> select(@NonNull
                                    Predicate<Element> predicate,
                                    boolean recursive)
        Selects children matching the given predicate. When recursive is set to true, it will select over all descendants.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate
        recursive - true if to select over all descendants, false immediate children
        Returns:
        the iterable of the descendants matching the predicate

      • selectWithAttribute
